title: Noam Chomsky Interview - The Vanguard Podcast
description:
Zac & Gavin, hosts of The Vanguard Podcast, interview linguist, philosopher, cognitive scientist, historian, social critic, and political activist Noam Chomsky. Recorded April 16, 2021.

His new book, "Chomsky for Activists": https://www.routledge.com/Chomsky-for-Activists/Chomsky-Derber-Moodliar-Shannon/p/book/9780367543396

Our Patrons saw this interview first. Become a Patron: https://www.patreon.com/thevanguardchannel
